main event: Several citizens observed a bright, round, white light hovering and maneuvering at low altitude in Hamburg, New York on February 7, 1969.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 15 minutes before suddenly accelerating and disappearing from view., It was reported to be round, approximately 40-50 feet in diameter, and emitting a brilliant white light., The object hovered at an estimated altitude of 1,000-2,000 feet., No sound was associated with the sighting., This report was classified as 'Unidentified' by Project Blue Book after investigation.
